purpose: The email announces a Postdoctoral Researcher position at DTU Compute in Denmark.
evidence_sentences: There is a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Dynamical Systems section at DTU Compute, Technical University of Denmark in the field of Software Architecture and Software Evaluation (Quality attributes), OR Digital Twin & Digital Transformation.

If you're an applied researcher with a passion for practical European projects, this is your opportunity to elevate your work in Software Engineering and contribute to impactful research with real-world relevance.
Please find the full job posting and application details below.
